creator: blasinton@latinmail.com
text:
I am runing apache 2.2.2 - php 5.1.4. - MySQL 5.0.21 (on windows XP 
profesional with all service packs instaled.
(exactly the same run good in IIS, but not when i make it over appache.)
This the error:
    Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Can not load 
required PHP extension: "mysqli.dll". Not supported in multithreaded Web 
servers - use extension=mysqli.dll in your php.ini' in C:\Archivos de 
programa\Apache Software Foundation\Apache2.2
\htdocs\RC4PHP\RC4PHP\rc4php.php:92 Stack trace: #0 C:\Archivos de 
programa\Apache Software Foundation\Apache2.2
\htdocs\RC4PHP\RC4PHP\rc4php_db_mysql.php(92): RC4PHP::_checkPHPExtension
('mysqli') #1 C:\Archivos de programa\Apache Software Foundation\Apache2.2
\htdocs\RC4PHP\rc4php_example.php(14): RC4PHP_DB_MySQL->__construct
('calendar', 'localhost', 'root', '') #2 {main} thrown in C:\Archivos de 
programa\Apache Software Foundation\Apache2.2\htdocs\RC4PHP\RC4PHP\rc4php.php 
on line 92
---------------------------------------------

Sorry, i try to help, but i cannot understand many of the fields thap people 
must complete to write this bug. 
Thanks.
Blas.
blasinton@latinmail.com
creator: blasinton@latinmail.com

text:
PHP is the issue of concern.
You need to look for help on a PHP users mailing list.
PHP isn't supported in this problem reporting system.
creator: trawick@apache.org
